sentence.text: However, the pathophysiological mechanisms leading to bilateral kidney agenesis (BKA) remain largely elusive.

Whole-exome or targeted exome sequencing of 183 unrelated familial and/or severe CAKUT-affected case subjects, including 54 fetuses with BKA, led to the identification of 16 heterozygous variants in GREB1L (growth regulation by estrogen in breast cancer 1-like), a gene reported as a target of retinoic acid signaling.
